books.author: Imam Muhammad al-Bukhari
books.description: The most authentic collection of Hadith, compiled by Imam al-Bukhari. Contains sayings, actions, and approvals of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).

books.author: Imam Muslim ibn al-Hajjaj
books.description: The second most authentic collection of Hadith after Sahih Bukhari. Known for its strict criteria of authenticity.

books.author: Imam Abu Dawood
books.description: A collection focusing on legal and practical aspects of Islamic jurisprudence, containing authentic and reliable Hadith.

books.author: Imam al-Tirmidhi
books.description: Known for its comprehensive coverage and detailed commentary on the authenticity of each Hadith.

books.author: Imam al-Nasa'i
books.description: A collection emphasizing ritual practices and religious obligations with careful attention to chain of narration.

books.author: Ibn Majah
books.description: The sixth book of the major Hadith collections, covering various aspects of Islamic law and practice.
